about_the_game:
▶ "But I'm still not the strongest...!"

  •  Snow • Fall is a deck builder rogue-like that mixes strategic gameplay with fast-paced and satisfying item synergies.

  • Play a Cube and face off in a Clash. The person who rolls the higher number gets to attack.

  • Watch as your character performs high-damage combos against the enemy at your command. Or have the opposite happen, if you're bad.

  • Each battle is a test of your game knowledge and ability to adapt to unknown circumstances.

  • The more you play, the more you'll understand. Make game destroying combinations or be sent back to the main menu, it all depends on you.

    ⠀
    ⠀

    ⠀

▶ "If you can't beat them physically, you'll just have to outsmart them!" 

  • At the end of each battle, choose between new items or Cubes to add to your inventory.

  • With over 70 different Cubes and 50 items, the way you play each run will be entirely different.

  • Build your deck around whatever archetype you enjoy playing the most.

  • Unlock-able content through Steam Achievements.  

  • Random events and enemy variety will make sure that even with the same deck, the key to victory will never be so straight-forward.

    ⠀
    ⠀

    ⠀

▶  "Don't look at me...! This coward, hiding behind a closed door doesn't deserve you!"

  • Play as the Liu family as they find themselves tangled up in a series of misfortunate events, all starting with a reckless decision to rob a Station...

  • Explore the authoritarian country of Heijing through the eyes of the citizens with the most potential. 

  • Watch the tragicomedy unfold throughout multiple Side Stories.

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes crude language, fights without gore, killing, criminal acts, and heavy themes such as drug use, fictional racism and fictional racial discrimination.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) N5095
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: I'd be very disappointed if you couldn't run this game
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Snow • Fall is a modern deck builder roguelike where you grow exponentially stronger to craft destructive item and card combinations. Make your way through the country of Heijing as you discover more ways to play and more hidden truths as the story unveils.
